name: Medic Rush
description:
Summary

You must heal infected villagers, including you. 

You are limited to have 3 heal kits (max capacity) 1 heal kit for 1 unit, obtain them from the heal box supply. If you are infected even a little bit you can spread the infection to others, whereas villagers can only spread if it becomes fully infected. You can force a villager to follow you when ever you want. Beat the timer as you play, the faster the better.

Input keys (Keyboard)

Z : toggle mask

X : heal self

C : heal a villager

E : make a villager follow you and to obtain heal kits 

WASD / Arrow keys : move (walk)

Hold left shift / left alt : run

Esc : pause
